content: --एक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} each, each one, every single one. (--कं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {1} one by one, one at a time, severally; singly, in every one, to every one; <ab>oft.</ab> with the force of an adjective; विवेश दंडकारण्यं प्रत्येकं च सतां मनः <ls>R. 12. 9</ls> ‘entered the mind of every good man’; <ls n="R.">12. 3</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 34</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 31.</ls>
